resources.string: I\'m a Program Manager and Full Stack Software Developer who loves supporting aspiring Software Developers. I was part of the Andela team that supported 60,000+ Scholars in the Google Africa Developer Scholarship across Africa. I\'d love to combine my passion for Program management with my software development skills to continue supporting people. Most of the projects done can be found in my Github profile https://github.com/esidem and my personal blog http://techdepo.com.ng . My technical skills includes: Java, XML, Android, Material Design, Firebase, SQLile, JSON,Google App Engine, ROOM.
